SEARCH
Modul CineTrack
Package org.com.controller.cinematics.helper

Schnittstelle CinematicController

Alle bekannten Implementierungsklassen:
AnimeController, MovieController, SeriesController
public interface CinematicController
Interface for managing the loading of Cinematic data in controllers. Implementing classes should define how to load and handle the display of a list of Cinematics.
Version:
1.0
Autor:
umut
Siehe auch:
  • Cinematic

  • Methodenübersicht

    Modifizierer und Typ
    Methode
    Beschreibung
    void
    loadData(List<Cinematic> cinematics)
    Loads a list of Cinematic objects into the controller.

  • Methodendetails

    • loadData

      void loadData(List<Cinematic> cinematics)
      Loads a list of Cinematic objects into the controller. The implementation of this method will define how the Cinematics are processed and displayed.
      Parameter:
      cinematics - A list of Cinematic objects to load.
